H0.text: what are abraham sons names. Ishmael

H1.text: what are abraham sons names. Isaac

H2.text: what are abraham sons names. Jokshan

H3.text: what are abraham sons names. Shuah

A4.text: Hagar soon bore Ishmael, who was the first son of Abraham.

A5.text: Ishmael's half-brother Isaac was born to Abraham by his wife Sarah when she was 90 years old, after she had ceased showing any signs of fertility.

A6.text: He was Keturah's second son and Abraham's fourth.

A7.text: Jokshan had five brothers: Zimran, Medan, Midian, Ishbak and Shuah.

A8.text: Shuah was the sixth son of Abraham and Keturah.

A9.text: Shuah was the youngest of Keturah's sons; the others were Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, and Ishbak.
